nodes.documentation:
@title TokenPoll
@author Nick Geoca
nodes.name: Escrow

nodes.documentation:
@notice Change owner of token poll
@param _newOwner New owner of token poll
nodes.name: transferOwnership
initialize
setupNextRound

nodes.documentation: @notice Starts the round. Must be manually called to start the round. (called after round _startTime. see setupNextRound).
nodes.name: startRound

nodes.documentation: @notice After round is over, this tallies votes and either refunds users or funds the ICO.
nodes.name: approveNewRound

nodes.documentation: @notice Each user calls this to allocate their votes. Must be in allocation time-period/state (see initialize)
nodes.name: allocVotes
castVote

nodes.documentation:
@notice Each user calls this to get a refund. This happens after users successfully voted to refund. Must be in Refund state.
 @return Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint indexed quantity)
nodes.name: userRefund

nodes.documentation: @notice This starts the refund after a refund was voted for. It only needs to be called once, then the refund starts. Must be in PostRoundDecision state.
nodes.name: startRefund_voteFailed

nodes.documentation: @notice This starts the refund if there was no funding for too long a time. It only needs to be called once to be put in refund state. Must be in NextRoundApproved state.
nodes.name: startRefund_illegalRoundDelay

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets user's refund size. Assumes they were not refunded yet
nodes.name: getUserRefundSize

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the current round start time
nodes.name: getRoundStartTime

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the current round end time
nodes.name: getRoundEndTime

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets if the user has voted, for given funding-round and voting-round number
nodes.name: getHasVoted

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets the current state
nodes.name: getState

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets user vote power. Based on square root of vote allocation
nodes.name: getUserVotePower

nodes.documentation: @notice y = floor(sqrt(x))
nodes.name: sqrt

nodes.documentation: @return RoundResult(uint indexed round, uint indexed votingRoundNumber, bool approvedFunding, uint weightedYesVotes, uint weightedNoVotes, uint yesVoters, uint noVoters, uint fundSize)
nodes.name: transitionFromState_PostRoundDecision
